description: T1 - Ash - FellT4 - Prunus - Crown reduce back to previous points of reduction (50cm from branch tips)T5 - Prunus - FellG6 - Mixed Group - Cut back from building by 2m.  Crown life to 2.5m above ground level.   This dimension to be taken from adjacent soil level, not the pavement below.  * amended as agreed with Michael Thomas in e-mail dated 05.03.19T7 - Lime - Reduce back to previous points of reductionT8 - Lime - Reduce back to previous points of reductionT9 - Lime - Reduce back to previous points of reductionT10 - Leyland Cypress - FellT11 - Lime - Reduce crown back to previous reduction points (removing approx.. 3m from branch tips)T12 - Lime - Reduce crown back to previous reduction points (removing approx.. 3m from branch tips)T13 - Lime - Reduce crown back to previous reduction points (removing approx.. 3m from branch tips)T14 - Lime - Reduce crown back to previous reduction points (removing approx.. 3m from branch tips)T16 - Horse Chestnut - FellT19 - Horse Chestnut - Crown lift to 3m
decision_conditions: Works agreed to tree labelled T1
